channel.title: Built in Microphone - Windows 7
channel.description:
Hi i upgraded my brothers laptop to windows 7 today and now the built in microphone wont work... It was previously running windows vista home premium and was working fine.
The laptop is a HP G60-213EM, with 1GB ram and 250gb HDD not that it matters...
Please help as he is blaming me for fucking up his laptop... and he needs the microphone to talk to relatives using skype.
he does not want to buy an external microphone as he likes his laptop to be portable.

item.title: Built in Microphone - Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

yeah, the graphics card that came with my laptop is like 4 years old and when i installed windows 7 it didnt support it but then i just ran windows updates and it updated the driver

Read full topic

item.title: Built in Microphone - Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

What driver am i looking for?

They dont have explanations, This is the page.
http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/softwareList?os=4062&lc=en&dlc=en&cc=us&lang=en&product=3879658

[hr]
Edit; Fixed, Microphone works now. Had to Update my Audio driver.

Read full topic

item.title: Built in Microphone - Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Look for drivers on the HP site.

Read full topic
